title: 100 Ghosts: A Gallery of Harmless Haunts
description: Cut two eyeholes into a bedsheet and BOO! Youâ€™ve got yourself a classic Halloween icon. But what does that ghosts look like when he's shy? Or in love? Or a pirate, a llama, a Bona villain, or Russian nesting doll? 100 Ghosts explores every sort of spook in a series of whimsically haunting illustrations. It's a delightful collection for adults, children, and anyone in need of a friendly fright.
author: Doogie Horner
